Amanda said: David Hasselhoff has settled into the job really well, the only thing he keeps doing is trying to entertain the audience all the time!`` Simon Cowell is so busy doing The X Factor in America, so we're lucky to get him back for the live shows. It's brilliant- it's like the king's away and all his little courtiers are all playing- we've been quite naughty! Amanda looked the picture of glamour as she arrived at the Opera House, with a Marilyn Monroe-esque hairdo and wearing a white cape-style coat hiding her baby bump. Many fewer people died in the Australian Floods. Why? `` The hillside areas around Rio lacked early warning systems or effective community organizations that might have helped residents to wake one another as the rains intensified last Tuesday night, disaster experts and residents said. Most people are believed to have died early Wednesday morning as they slept, when water-loosened earth swept their houses away. His senior defensive end/linebacker Jarrell McKinney signed with Western Michigan.`` He's my first Division I recruit,'' the Albert said of Jarrell McKinney . He has tremendous speed. He runs the 40 in 4.5. He's 6-5, 210, and when he goes to college they're going to put another 20-30 pounds on him. Playing defensive end, he's going to be outstanding. He's the role model for our other kids.... He's that bar that we have to set for ourselves. Cody has an experienced offensive line and receivers coming back, and the Albert said junior-to-be quarterback Mario Gulley`` has Michael Vick capabilities.''
